$ iou-issuer default-ripple rEbvdqTyRZVvYun1zdNU5pqZgWdNZRYQBD sshcfshUQBZHVtTVrFCdYHcZzYefN

trust.description: Create trust line: Trust an account up to the specified amount of currency

$ iou-issuer trust r9vYkdnueogdPSZ4pT9tyXpxtjX2P31nP3 sawFJgo2bqcUBH2utvhSZV6FfsfSk   --issuer=rEbvdqTyRZVvYun1zdNU5pqZgWdNZRYQBD --value=100 --currency=USD
